column2: (Gen 2) Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
Restores 20 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
(Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.
(Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.
Holder's Fighting-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Holder's Dark-type attacks have 1.1x power.
An attack against the holder has its accuracy out of 255 lowered by 20.
(Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is frozen. Single use.
Holder's Fire-type attacks have 1.1x power.
No competitive use.
Holder's Dragon-type attacks have 1.1x power. Evolves Seadra (trade).
A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon which are quick to run away.
Evolves Vulpix into Ninetales, Growlithe into Arcanine, Eevee into Flareon, and Pansear into Simisear when used.
Holder has a ~11.7% chance to survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP.
A Poke Ball that makes caught Pokemon more friendly.
(Gen 2) Restores 30 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
A high-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Poke Ball.
Holder's Rock-type attacks have 1.1x power.
A Poke Ball for catching very heavy Pokemon.
(Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.
Holder's attacks without a chance to make the target flinch gain a 10% chance to make the target flinch. Evolves Poliwhirl into Politoed and Slowpoke into Slowking when traded.
Evolves Gloom into Vileplume, Weepinbell into Victreebel, Exeggcute into Exeggutor or Alolan Exeggutor, Nuzleaf into Shiftry, and Pansage into Simisage when used.
At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.
A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are a lower level than your own.
If held by a Pikachu, its Special Attack is doubled.
Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are the opposite gender of your Pokemon.
If held by a Chansey, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)
A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon hooked by a Rod when fishing.
Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Cannot be given to or taken from a Pokemon, except by Covet/Knock Off/Thief.
The best Ball with the ultimate performance. It will catch any wild Pokemon.
Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.1x power. Evolves Onix into Steelix and Scyther into Scizor when traded.
If held by a Ditto, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x, even while Transformed.
(Gen 2) Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.
(Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a status condition. Single use.
Holder's Grass-type attacks have 1.1x power.
A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that evolve using the Moon Stone.
Evolves Nidorina into Nidoqueen, Nidorino into Nidoking, Clefairy into Clefable, Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, Skitty into Delcatty, and Munna into Musharna when used.
(Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.
Holder's Water-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Holder's Ice-type attacks have 1.1x power.
(Gen 2) Holder's Normal-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Holder's Poison-type attacks have 1.1x power.
A device for catching wild Pokemon. It is designed as a capsule system.
(Gen 2) Holder's Normal-type attacks have 1.1x power.
(Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.
(Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.
Each turn, holder has a ~23.4% chance to move first in its priority bracket.
Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
Holder's Flying-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Holder's Bug-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Holder's Ground-type attacks have 1.1x power.
Holder's Ghost-type attacks have 1.1x power.
A special Poke Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.
If held by a Farfetchâ€™d, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)
Evolves Gloom into Bellossom, Sunkern into Sunflora, Cottonee into Whimsicott, Petilil into Lilligant, and Helioptile into Heliolisk when used.
If held by a Cubone or a Marowak, its Attack is doubled.
Evolves Pikachu into Raichu or Alolan Raichu, Eevee into Jolteon, and Eelektrik into Eelektross when used.
Holder's Psychic-type attacks have 1.1x power.
An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.
Evolves Porygon into Porygon2 when traded.
Evolves Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, Shellder into Cloyster, Staryu into Starmie, Eevee into Vaporeon, Lombre into Ludicolo, and Panpour into Simipour when used.
